original_text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh. For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth, much more shall not we escape, if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven:
korean_text: 너희는 삼가 말씀하신 이를 거역하지 말라 땅에서 경고하신 이를 거역한 그들이 피하지 못하였거든 하물며 하늘로부터 경고하신 이를 배반하는 우리일까보냐

sentences.original_text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh.
who refused him that spake on earth,
much more shall not we escape,
if we turn away from him
